title: Contact
body:
<!--StartFragment-->

Minas Cristais is located in Sete Lagoas, Minas Gerais, Brazil, a region known for the production of high quality crystals and minerals.

We began out of a small shop over 30 years ago

In 2011, we opened our virtual store, expanding sales throughout Brazil and around the world.

Today, Minas Cristais is a staple in the market and works to connect people and nature.

In 2018 we opened our retail and wholesale store in Curvelo, Minas Gerais.

The Sete Lagoas store was expanded in 2020 to better serve the public.

The Belo Horizonte store was opened on April 10, 2021, Av. Augusto de Lima, 744 â€“ Store 109 (Mercado Central of Belo Horizonte).

**Our Products:**

Currently, Minas Cristais keeps in stock a large variety of different types and qualities of minerals, gems, handicrafts and decorative items.

In addition to numerous types of quartz, we also offer other semi-precious stones, such as agate, soapstone, chalcedony and obsidian.

Additionally, our stores sell a variety of jewelry, such as pendants, necklaces, rings and bracelets.

All of our products come from nature and are therefore unique. With that in mind, we always try to keep our web page updated so that our customers can view all available items. On our Instagram you can also follow the news andÂ  view available products.

We provide accurate information about sizes and weights so you can choose the products most interesting to you.

In case you need different images or more information, we will gladly send them via e-mail or whatsapp.

If you don't find what you're looking for, feel free to contact us. We will check our stock and procure your order according to your needs.

Whatsapp: [+55 31 7124-4130](https://web.whatsapp.com/send?phone=%2B55553171244130)

**Our goal:**

Minas Cristais aims to promptly serve its customers, offering carefully selected and high quality products, with attractive prices, with the fastest delivery time.

We are constantly adapting to technology so that we are available to build relationships online through social networks and whatsapp.

We have a personalized service by Whatsapp to answer all questions related to purchase orders. Available Monday - Friday from 9 am to 5 pm DF (GMT-3)

Through our social media channels (Instagram, Tik Tok, Facebook and Youtube), we are always available to talk to you and bring you relevant content about our products, and behind the scenes of what happens in our stores. We hope to see you there too :)

**Our Goal:**

To better serve our domestic customers and new customers abroad. Keeping the quality standard that we have been able to achieve in all of our years of work.

Return to perform at Gem Shows and Exhibitions in Brazil and abroad as we did before the pandemic.

Taking our gems, jewelry, semi-precious and handcrafted stones throughout Brazil and the world.

Always looking for updates on the technological and logistical side, bringing you faster delivery of your products.

Minas Cristais - Transparency is our business!
